text: For a period of 2 years following July 22, 1992, all reference to a professional counselor shall be deemed to refer to a person meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether that person is licensed.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 2-3307.11.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-126, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1202.13.

DC CODE § 3-1207.11

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Qualifications for Licensure to Practice Professional Counseling; Transition of Professional Counselors; Waiver of Licensure Requirements.
